option.helptext:
Controls how much skill training happens on each successful melee weapon hit.
The value is a percentage: ○ {{k|00}}{{W|0}}: training disabled. ○ {{k|00}}{{W|1}}: 0.01 points per hit. ○ {{k|0}}{{W|10}}: 0.10 points per hit (default). ○ {{k|0}}{{W|50}}: 0.50 points per hit. ○ {{W|100}}: 1.00 point per hit.
Trained skills: {{Y|Axe}}, {{Y|Cudgel}}, {{Y|Long Blade}}, {{Y|Short Blade}}, {{Y|Single Weapon Fighting}} (halved), and {{Y|Multiweapon Fighting}} (doubled).

Controls how much skill training happens on each successful thrown weapon hit.
The value is a percentage: ○ {{k|00}}{{W|0}}: training disabled. ○ {{k|00}}{{W|1}}: 0.01 points per hit. ○ {{k|0}}{{W|25}}: 0.25 points per hit (default). ○ {{k|0}}{{W|50}}: 0.50 points per hit. ○ {{W|100}}: 1.00 point per hit.
Trained skills: {{Y|Deft Throwing}}.

Controls how much skill training happens on each successful missile weapon hit.
The value is a percentage: ○ {{k|00}}{{W|0}}: training disabled. ○ {{k|00}}{{W|1}}: 0.01 points per hit. ○ {{k|0}}{{W|25}}: 0.25 points per hit (default). ○ {{k|0}}{{W|50}}: 0.50 points per hit. ○ {{W|100}}: 1.00 point per hit.
Trained skills: {{Y|Bow and Rifle}}, {{Y|Heavy Weapon}}, and {{Y|Pistol}}.

Controls how much skill training happens every time you cook and eat a meal.
The value is a percentage: ○ {{k|00}}{{W|0}}: training disabled. ○ {{k|00}}{{W|1}}: 0.01 points per meal. ○ {{k|0}}{{W|33}}: 0.33 points per meal (default). ○ {{k|0}}{{W|50}}: 0.50 points per meal. ○ {{W|100}}: 1.00 point per meal.
Trained skills: {{Y|Cooking and Gathering}}.
